title: Cover Letter
description: Generate professional cover letters that highlight your strengths and stand out to employers.
prompt: Write a cover letter for the position of **job_title** at **company_name**. My name is **your_name** and my skills include **your_skills**.

title: Math Question
description: Solve complex math questions with ease. Get step-by-step solutions and understand the process.
prompt: Solve the following math question: **question**. Provide step-by-step solutions.

title: Bullet Point Answer
description: Generate concise bullet point answers for any question. Save time and get straight to the point.
prompt: Provide a bullet point answer for the following question: **question**.

title: Academic Essay
description: Generate an academic essay based on the given topic and guidelines.
prompt: Write an academic essay on the following topic: **topic**.

title: Thesis Statement
description: Generate a thesis statement for the given topic.
prompt: Generate a thesis statement for the following topic: **topic**.

title: Proofreading
description: Proofread the given text and provide suggestions for improvement.
prompt: Proofread the following text and provide suggestions for improvement: **text_to_proofread**.

title: Rephrase
description: Rephrase the given text to improve clarity and readability.
prompt: Rephrase the following text to improve clarity and readability: **text_to_rephrase**.

title: Improve
description: Improve the given text by enhancing its quality and clarity.
prompt: Improve the following text by enhancing its quality and clarity: **text_to_improve**.

title: Job Description
description: Generate comprehensive job descriptions tailored to your company needs.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M15 8V4H5c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2v12c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h14c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V9c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2h-4z"/><path d="M17 8h-4V4h4v4zm-2-2v-1H9v1h6zM19 18H5V9h14v9zm0-10H5V6h14v2z"/></svg>
prompt: Generate a comprehensive job description for the role of **job_title** at **company_name**.

title: Application Letter
description: Craft personalized application letters that grab attention and highlight your qualifications.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M5 4v16h14V4H5zm12 14H7V6h10v12z"/></svg>
prompt: Craft a personalized application letter for the position of **job_title** at **company_name**. Highlight your qualifications, experiences, and reasons for applying. My name is **your_name** and my qualifications include **your_qualifications**.

title: Resume Builder
description: Create professional resumes tailored to your skills and experience.
prompt: Create a professional resume highlighting your skills and experiences. My name is **your_name** and my skills include **your_skills**.

title: Linkedin
description: Generate engaging LinkedIn profile descriptions that attract attention from employers and connections.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M3 4v16h18V4H3zm16 14H5V6h14v12zm-6-3v-1h3v1h-3zM7 11h10v1H7v-1z"/></svg>
prompt: Generate an engaging LinkedIn profile description for **your_name**, **your_title**. Provide a summary that attracts attention from employers and connections. **your_summary**.

title: Startup Ideas (w/ quantities)
description: Generate innovative startup ideas along with estimated quantities and market analysis.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M5 2v2H3v2h2v2h2V6h2V4H5zm12 0v2h4v4h2V6h2V4h-2V2h-2zm-4 4h2v4h-2zm4 4h2v4h-2zm-4 0h2v4h-2zm-6 6h2v2H7v-2zm4 0h2v2h-2zm4 0h2v2h-2zm4 0h2v2h-2zm-12 2h2v2H3v-2zm8 0h2v2h-2zm4 0h2v2h-2z"/></svg>
prompt: Generate innovative startup ideas based on the provided keywords '**keywords**'. Identify market opportunities, target audience, and potential business models.

title: PAS
description: Generate Persuasion-Awareness-Solution (PAS) frameworks for persuasive communication strategies.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M5 2v2H3v2h2v2h2V6h2V4H5zm12 0v2h4v4h2V6h2V4h-2V2h-2zm-4 4h2v4h-2zm4 4h2v4h-2zm-4 0h2v4h-2zm-6 6h2v2H7v-2zm4 0h2v2h-2zm4 0h2v2h-2zm4 0h2v2h-2zm-12 2h2v2H3v-2zm8 0h2v2h-2zm4 0h2v2h-2z"/></svg>
prompt: Create Problem-Agitate-Solution (PAS) frameworks for effective marketing campaigns. Identify the pain point '**pain**', agitate the problem '**agitation**', and present the solution '**solution**'.

title: AIDA
description: Create Attention-Interest-Desire-Action (AIDA) frameworks for effective marketing campaigns.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M15 8V4H5c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2v12c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h14c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V9c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2h-4z"/><path d="M17 8h-4V4h4v4zm-2-2v-1H9v1h6zM19 18H5V9h14v9zm0-10H5V6h14v2z"/></svg>
prompt: Develop Attention-Interest-Desire-Action (AIDA) frameworks for marketing strategies. Capture attention with '**attention**', generate interest with '**interest**', create desire with '**desire**', and prompt action with '**action**'.

title: Strategy
description: Generate strategic plans and frameworks for business development and growth.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M3 4v16h18V4H3zm16 14H5V6h14v12zm-6-3v-1h3v1h-3zM7 11h10v1H7v-1z"/></svg>
prompt: Develop strategic plans and initiatives based on the provided keywords '**keywords**'. Identify objectives, key actions, and performance indicators to achieve desired outcomes.

title: Personal Bio
description: Generate compelling personal biographies for professional profiles and portfolios.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M3 4v16h18V4H3zm16 14H5V6h14v12zm-6-3v-1h3v1h-3zM7 11h10v1H7v-1z"/></svg>
prompt: Generate a compelling personal biography for **your_name**. Highlight your professional achievements, skills, and experiences. **your_summary**.

title: Career Advice
description: Provide career advice and guidance tailored to individual skills, goals, and aspirations.
image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M3 4v16h18V4H3zm16 14H5V6h14v12zm-6-3v-1h3v1h-3zM7 11h10v1H7v-1z"/></svg>
prompt: Provide career advice and guidance tailored to individual skills, goals, and aspirations based on the provided keywords '**keywords**'. Offer personalized recommendations for career advancement and growth.

title: Cost Benefit Analysis
description: Conduct cost-benefit analyses to evaluate potential business decisions and investments.
prompt: Conduct cost-benefit analyses to evaluate potential business decisions and investments based on the provided keywords '**keywords**'. Identify costs, benefits, and calculate the ROI for various scenarios.

title: Brainstorming
description: Generate creative ideas and solutions through structured brainstorming sessions.
prompt: Generate creative ideas and solutions through structured brainstorming sessions based on the provided keywords '**keywords**'. Explore innovative concepts and strategies to address specific challenges or opportunities.

title: Linkedin Post
description: Craft engaging and professional posts for sharing on LinkedIn.
prompt: Write a LinkedIn post on the following topic: **post_content**. Provide valuable insights, tips, or updates related to your industry or profession.

title: Sales Pitch
description: Craft persuasive sales pitches to attract potential clients and investors.
prompt: Craft a persuasive sales pitch for **product_or_service** targeting **target_audience**. Highlight the unique selling proposition '**unique_selling_proposition**' and key benefits.

title: Social Media Reply
description: Craft effective and professional replies to social media comments and messages.
prompt: Craft a professional reply for a comment/message on **platform**. The comment/message is: **comment**.

title: Apology Email
description: Write a sincere and professional apology email for any situation.
prompt: Write a professional apology email to **recipient_name** regarding the following issue: **issue_description**.

title: Ticket Reply
description: Generate professional replies for customer support tickets.
prompt: Generate a professional reply for the support ticket with ID **ticket_id**. The ticket content is: **ticket_content**.

title: Article Generator - Documentation
description: Generate detailed documentation articles based on the provided topics and instructions.
prompt: Generate a detailed documentation article on the topic **topic**. Follow these instructions: **instructions**.

title: Song Lyrics
description: Generate creative and original song lyrics for any genre.
prompt: Generate song lyrics in the **genre** genre with the theme of **theme**.

title: Jokes
description: Create funny and entertaining jokes.
prompt: Create a joke about **topic**.

title: Event Planner
description: Plan a detailed event itinerary.
prompt: Plan an event of type **event_type** with the following details: **details**.

title: Travel Planner
description: Create a detailed travel itinerary for any destination.
prompt: Plan a travel itinerary to **destination** with the following preferences: **preferences**.

title: Gift Ideas
description: Generate creative and personalized gift ideas.
prompt: Generate gift ideas for **recipient** on the occasion of **occasion**.

title: Product Description
description: Create detailed and appealing product descriptions.
prompt: Write a detailed product description for **product_name**. The product details are: **product_details**.

title: Product Features
description: Highlight the key features of a product.
prompt: List the key features of **product_name**. The features are: **features**.

title: Product Name Ideas
description: Generate creative and catchy product name ideas.
prompt: Generate **quantity** product name ideas for a **product_type**.

title: Why Choose This Product
description: Explain why a customer should choose a specific product.
prompt: Explain why a customer should choose **product_name**. The reasons are: **reasons**.

title: Reviews
description: Generate detailed reviews for a product.
prompt: Write a detailed review for **product_name**. The review details are: **review_details**.

title: Review Responder
description: Craft professional responses to customer reviews.
prompt: Craft a professional response to the following customer review: **review**. The response is: **response**.

title: Amazon
description: Generate Amazon product listings and descriptions.
prompt: Generate an Amazon product listing for **product_name**. The product details are: **product_details**.

title: Sitemap
description: Generate a comprehensive sitemap for your website.
prompt: Generate a sitemap for the website: **website_url**.

title: Tagline
description: Create a catchy and memorable tagline for your website.
prompt: Create a catchy tagline for **website_name**. Description: **description**.

title: UX Ideas
description: Generate innovative UX ideas to improve user experience.
prompt: Provide UX improvement ideas for **website_name**. Current issues: **current_issues**.

title: Design Ideas
description: Get creative design ideas for your website.
prompt: Generate design ideas for **website_name**. Preferences: **design_preferences**.

title: Services Page
description: Create detailed content for your services page.
prompt: Write content for the services page for **service_name**. Details: **service_details**.

title: Features Page
description: Create detailed content for your features page.
prompt: Write content for the features page for **feature_name**. Details: **feature_details**.

title: Keyword Generator
description: Generate relevant keywords for your website content.
prompt: Generate relevant keywords for the topic: **topic**.

title: Keyword Extractor
description: Extract important keywords from your website content.
prompt: Extract keywords from the following content: **content**.

title: SEO
description: Optimize your website content for search engines.
prompt: Optimize the website content for search engines. Content: **content**. Keywords: **keywords**.

title: Testimonials
description: Generate authentic testimonials for your website.
prompt: Generate a testimonial for **customer_name**. Testimonial: **testimonial**.

title: Landing Page Content - Copywriting
description: Create compelling copy for your landing page.
prompt: Write compelling copy for the landing page of **product_name**. Benefits: **benefits**.

title: Website - Copywriting
description: Create engaging copy for your website pages.
prompt: Write engaging copy for the **page_name** page. Content: **content**.

title: FAQ
description: Generate frequently asked questions for your website.
prompt: Generate frequently asked questions on the topic: **topic**.

title: Call to Action
description: Create compelling calls to action for your website.
prompt: Create a compelling call to action: **action**.

title: Meta Description
description: Generate meta descriptions for your website pages.
prompt: Generate a meta description for **page_name** page. Description: **description**.

title: Rewrite with Keywords
description: Rewrite website content with targeted keywords.
prompt: Rewrite the content with targeted keywords. Content: **content**. Keywords: **keywords**.

title: Privacy Policy
description: Generate a privacy policy for your website.
prompt: Generate a privacy policy for **company_name**.

title: Terms and Conditions
description: Generate terms and conditions for your website.
prompt: Generate terms and conditions for **company_name**.

title: Blog Ideas
description: Generate creative ideas for your next blog post.
prompt: Generate creative ideas for your next blog post on the topic: **topic**.

title: Blog Intro
description: Generate an engaging introduction for your blog post.
prompt: Generate an engaging introduction for your blog post on **topic**.

title: Blog Section
description: Generate a section for your blog post.
prompt: Generate a section titled **section_title** for your blog post. Content: **section_content**.

title: Blog Outline
description: Generate an outline for your blog post.
prompt: Generate an outline for your blog post on **topic**. Sections: **sections**.

title: Blog Article
description: Generate a full article for your blog post.
prompt: Generate a full article for your blog post on **topic**. Sections: **sections**.

title: IG Reel Script
description: Generate a script for an Instagram Reel video.
prompt: Generate a script for an Instagram Reel video on **topic**.

title: IG Captions
description: Generate captions for Instagram posts.
prompt: Generate captions for Instagram posts with the photo description: **photo_description**.

title: TikTok Script
description: Generate a script for a TikTok video.
prompt: Generate a script for a TikTok video on **topic**.

title: TikTok Video Caption
description: Generate captions for TikTok videos.
prompt: Generate captions for TikTok videos with the video description: **video_description**.

title: TikTok Video Script
description: Generate a script for a TikTok video.
prompt: Generate a script for a TikTok video on **topic**.

title: Facebook Post
description: Generate engaging posts for Facebook.
prompt: Generate engaging posts for Facebook with the content: **post_content**.

title: Facebook Headlines
description: Generate attention-grabbing headlines for Facebook.
prompt: Generate attention-grabbing headlines for Facebook with the headline: **headline**.

title: Facebook Video Script
description: Generate a script for a Facebook video.
prompt: Generate a script for a Facebook video on **topic**.

title: X Tweet
description: Generate a tweet for any purpose.
prompt: Generate a tweet with the following content: **tweet_content**.

title: X Thread
description: Generate a Twitter thread for any topic.
prompt: Generate a Twitter thread with the following content: **thread_content**.

title: Youtube Video Title
description: Generate titles for YouTube videos.
prompt: Generate titles for YouTube videos on **video_topic**.

title: Youtube Video Description
description: Generate descriptions for YouTube videos.
prompt: Generate descriptions for YouTube videos on **video_topic**.

title: Youtube Video Tag
description: Generate tags for YouTube videos.
prompt: Generate tags for YouTube videos on **video_topic**.

title: Youtube Video to Blog Post
description: Generate blog posts from YouTube videos.
prompt: Generate blog posts from YouTube videos with the video URL: **video_url**.

title: Video Idea
description: Generate ideas for video content.
prompt: Generate ideas for video content on **topic**.

title: Video Description
description: Generate descriptions for videos.
prompt: Generate descriptions for videos on **video_topic**.

title: Viral Tweet Idea
description: Generate ideas for tweets that could potentially go viral.
prompt: Generate ideas for tweets that could potentially go viral on **topic**.

title: Clickbait Titles
description: Generate clickbait titles for social media posts.
prompt: Generate clickbait titles for social media posts on **topic**.

title: App and SMS Notifications
description: Generate notifications for mobile apps and SMS.
prompt: Generate notifications for **notification_type** with the message: **message**.

title: Advertising Ideas
description: Generate ideas for advertising campaigns.
prompt: Generate ideas for advertising campaigns on **topic**.

title: FB Ad
description: Generate content for Facebook advertisements.
prompt: Generate content for a Facebook advertisement: **ad_content**.

title: Google Ad
description: Generate content for Google advertisements.
prompt: Generate content for a Google advertisement: **ad_content**.

title: Ad Script
description: Generate scripts for advertisements.
prompt: Generate a script for a **ad_type** advertisement: **ad_content**.

title: TV Ads
description: Generate ideas and content for TV advertisements.
prompt: Generate ideas and content for TV advertisements: **ad_content**.

title: Youtube Ads
description: Generate ideas and content for YouTube advertisements.
prompt: Generate ideas and content for YouTube advertisements: **ad_content**.

title: Translate
description: Translate text from one language to another.
prompt: Translate the text **text** from **source_language** to **target_language**.

title: Grammar Check
description: Check grammar and provide suggestions for improvement.
prompt: Check the grammar of the text **text** and provide suggestions for improvement.

title: List Synonyms
description: Generate a list of synonyms for a given word.
prompt: Generate a list of synonyms for the word **word**.

title: Learn New Words
description: Discover and learn new words with their meanings and usage.
prompt: Discover and learn new words related to **topic** with their meanings and usage.

title: Bug Fix
description: Identify and fix bugs in code to improve functionality and performance.
prompt: Identify and fix the following issue: **issue_description**.

title: Explain Code
description: Provide explanations and clarifications on specific sections of code.
prompt: Provide explanations and clarifications on the following code section: **code_section**.

title: Teach Code
description: Create educational materials and tutorials to teach coding concepts and techniques.
prompt: Create educational materials and tutorials to teach the coding concept: **concept**.

title: Changelog Creator
description: Generate changelogs to document updates and modifications in software or projects.
prompt: Generate a changelog for version **version** documenting the following changes: **changes**.

title: Welcome Email
description: Craft a warm and engaging email to welcome new subscribers or users.
prompt: Craft a warm welcome email for **recipient_name**.

title: Invitation Mail
description: Create an inviting email to send out invitations for events, gatherings, or meetings.
prompt: Create an inviting email for **event_name** happening on **event_date**.

title: Follow up Email
description: Craft a follow-up email to reconnect with clients, customers, or contacts.
prompt: Craft a follow-up email for **recipient_name** regarding **reason**.

title: Reply Email
description: Compose a professional email response to reply to inquiries, questions, or requests.
prompt: Compose a professional email response to **sender_name** regarding the subject **subject**. Message: **message**.

title: Newsletter
description: Design and create a newsletter to share updates, news, or promotions with subscribers.
prompt: Design and create a newsletter on **topic**. Content: **content**.

title: Press Release
description: Write a press release to announce new products, events, or company updates.
prompt: Write a press release to announce: **announcement**.

title: Cold Email
description: Create an effective cold email to reach out to potential clients or partners.
prompt: Create an effective cold email to reach out to **recipient_name** regarding **reason**.

title: Create a Workout Plan
description: Design a personalized workout plan tailored to individual needs and fitness goals.
prompt: Design a personalized workout plan to achieve **fitness_goals** considering your **current_fitness_level**.

title: Create a Meal Plan
description: Develop a customized meal plan based on dietary preferences, nutritional needs, and health goals.
prompt: Develop a customized meal plan based on **dietary_preferences** to achieve **health_goals**.

title: eBook
description: Generate a complete eBook on any topic of your choice.
prompt: Generate a complete eBook on the topic **topic** for the **audience** audience.

title: Paragraph
description: Generate a well-written paragraph on any given topic.
prompt: Generate a well-written paragraph on the topic **topic**.

title: Story Generator
description: Generate creative story ideas or complete stories based on provided prompts.
prompt: Generate creative story ideas or complete stories based on the provided prompt: **prompt**.

title: Book Ideas
description: Generate ideas for new books or novels based on specified themes or genres.
prompt: Generate ideas for new books or novels based on the theme **theme**.

title: Content Improver
description: Enhance the quality and readability of existing content by providing suggestions for improvement.
prompt: Enhance the quality and readability of the provided content: **content**.

title: Explain to a Child
description: Simplify complex topics or concepts to make them understandable to children.
prompt: Simplify the topic **topic** to make it understandable to children.

title: Write News From a Journalist Point of View
description: Craft news articles from the perspective of a journalist.
prompt: Write a news article from the perspective of a journalist on the topic **topic**.

title: Generate From RSS Feed
description: Generate content based on the information extracted from a provided RSS feed.
prompt: Generate content based on the information extracted from the provided RSS feed: **rss_feed_url**.

title: Undetectable AI
description: Generate content or responses that are indistinguishable from human-generated content.
prompt: Generate content or responses that are indistinguishable from human-generated content based on the provided prompt: **prompt**.

title: Pros and Cons
description: Generate a list of pros and cons for any given topic.
prompt: Generate a list of pros and cons for the topic **topic**.

title: Real Estate Listing
description: Generate real estate listings for properties based on specified criteria.
prompt: Generate real estate listings for properties based on the following criteria: **criteria**.

title: Prompt Generator
description: Generate creative prompts to inspire writing, brainstorming, or idea generation.
prompt: Generate creative prompts of type **type** to inspire writing, brainstorming, or idea generation.
